thread.title: Report: Labissiere ruled eligible by NCAA
thread.title_full: Report: Labissiere ruled eligible by NCAA

title: Report: Labissiere ruled eligible by NCAA
text:
Report: Labissiere ruled eligible by NCAA Kentucky freshman is projected to be a top draft pick in next year's NBA Draft. Post to Facebook Report: Labissiere ruled eligible by NCAA Kentucky freshman is projected to be a top draft pick in next year's NBA Draft. Check out this story on courier-journal.com: http://cjky.it/1LSRwU6 Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation Kyle Williams and Jon Hale , @JonHale_CJ 6:36 p.m. EDT October 23, 2015 Skal Labissiere during the University of Kentucky mens basketball media day at the Joe Craft Center practice floor in Lexington, Ky., on Wednesday, October 14, 2015. Photo by Mike Weaver (Photo: Mike Weaver, Mike Weaver) 171 CONNECT 43 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Big Blue Nation can collectively exhale. 
UK freshman forward and top projected 2016 NBA Draft pick Skal Labissiere was granted NCAA eligibility on Friday, per a Yahoo report. 
The NCAA had been looking into Labissiere's relationship with his guardian, Gerald Hamilton. The big man came to the United States after an earthquake ravished his native Haiti in 2010 . He played for Reach Your Dream Prep, a team affiliated with Hamilton's nonprofit, after being ruled ineligible at two Memphis-area high schools. 
Labissiere has been practicing with the team. 
Coach John Calipari grew agitated with questions regarding Labissiere's eligibility at last week's SEC basketball media day. 
“Everything is good to go,” Calipari said before referring back to the school’s policy not to comment on a player’s eligibility until the first game. “There’s probably 50 players that have a review. Last year, we had five players have a review; a couple of them got cleared the week before the game. 
“Every year we’ve been here, players go through the review. You won’t believe this: It’s always the best players who go through the review. I think my team will be fine and you guys will figure it out when we go out the first day and everybody’s got uniforms. You’ll know, ‘Ah, they must’ve been cleared.’ ” 
UK will not comment on player eligibility until the season-opener, per a university spokesman. Kentucky freshman Skal Labissiere -- projected top draft pick -- has received NCAA eligibility to play 2015-16 season, sources tell Yahoo. 171 CONNECT 43 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Read or Share this story: http://cjky.it/1LSRwU6 TOP VIDEOS
